Class ConnexeApp

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
fr.connexe.ConnexeApp
public class ConnexeApp extends Application

Our entire application, which persists until it is closed.

Spins up the Scene and Stage of the app. Does it manage multiple pages too? We haven't decided yet.

    • showNewMazeDialog

      public boolean showNewMazeDialog(MazeRenderer mazeRenderer) throws IOException
      Setup and show the dialog box when clicking on the menu item to create a new Maze
      Parameters:
      mazeRenderer - passed by the MainController to be ready to receive a maze (to display later on the view)
      Returns:
      true if the user clicked OK, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file failed to load

    • showSolveMazeDialog

      public boolean showSolveMazeDialog(MazeController mazeController) throws IOException
      Setup and show the dialog box when clicking on the menu item to solve a maze, to select solving method
      Parameters:
      mazeController - the maze controller given to the dialog to configure maze solution display
      Returns:
      true if the user clicked OK, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file failed to load

    • showPlayArcadeDialog

      public Optional<GameStartConfig> showPlayArcadeDialog() throws IOException
      Shows the dialog box to start a new arcade game.
      Returns:
      the chosen game configuration if one has been chosen; otherwise, an empty optional will be given.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file failed to load

    • getMazeFilePath

      public File getMazeFilePath()
      Returns the file path of the last opened maze. Can be null if no maze was opened yet.
      Returns:
      the file path of the last opened maze; can be null!

    • setMazeFilePath

      public void setMazeFilePath(File file)
      Sets the file path of the last opened maze.
      Parameters:
      file - the file path of the last opened maze

    • updateStageTitle

      public void updateStageTitle(String file)
      Function used by controllers when opening/saving/creating maze files Set the Stage title to display the name of a currently opened maze file
      Parameters:
      file - The name of the currently opened file in the view. If null given, clears the app title
